title.v: khai báo thời gian nhà máy dừng hoạt động

items.key: (@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
items.check: (@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID))

command.text: declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512), @$duplicate nvarchar(512), @$existsShift nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Khai báo thời gian nhà máy dừng hoạt động của bộ phận %s đã tồn tại, không lưu được.' else N'The factory downtime declaration of department %s already exists, it can not be saved.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Bản ghi hiện thời đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'This item has been modified or deleted by another user.' end select @$duplicate = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Khai báo thời gian nhà máy dừng hoạt động của bộ phận %s bị trùng hoặc lồng nhau, không lưu được.' else N'The declaration of factory downtime of department %s is duplicated or nested and cannot be saved.' end

if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and ngay_tu = @ngay_tu and ngay_den = @ngay_den) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and @ngay_tu between ngay_tu and ngay_den) begin select 'ngay_tu' as field, replace(@$duplicate, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and @ngay_den between ngay_tu and ngay_den) begin select 'ngay_den' as field, replace(@$duplicate, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and @ngay_tu < ngay_tu and @ngay_den > ngay_den) begin select 'ngay_den' as field, replace(@$duplicate, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

if not exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue and ngay_tu = $ngay_tu.OldValue and ngay_den = $ngay_den.OldValue) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, @$recordHasBeenChanged as message return end
if ((@ma_bp <> $ma_bp.OldValue) or (@ngay_tu <> $ngay_tu.OldValue) or (@ngay_den <> $ngay_den.OldValue)) begin if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and ngay_tu = @ngay_tu and ngay_den = @ngay_den and not (ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue and ngay_tu = $ngay_tu.OldValue and ngay_den = $ngay_den.OldValue)) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, replace(@$duplicate, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and @ngay_tu between ngay_tu and ngay_den and not (ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue and ngay_tu = $ngay_tu.OldValue and ngay_den = $ngay_den.OldValue)) begin select 'ngay_tu' as field, replace(@$duplicate, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and @ngay_den between ngay_tu and ngay_den and not (ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue and ngay_tu = $ngay_tu.OldValue and ngay_den = $ngay_den.OldValue)) begin select 'ngay_den' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and @ngay_tu < ngay_tu and @ngay_den > ngay_den and not (ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue and ngay_tu = $ngay_tu.OldValue and ngay_den = $ngay_den.OldValue)) begin select 'ngay_den' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end end
update @@table set datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue and ngay_tu = $ngay_tu.OldValue and ngay_den = $ngay_den.OldValue
